metadata.name: The Night Crown
metadata.description:
Northern lights dancing over the iconic mount Kirkjufell, Iceland's most popular mountain. Camping by the river and waiting for the aurora in eerie silence has to be one of the most surreal experiences I've ever had during my trip. I was fortunate to have an incredible display of the magical green lights like a crown over the mountain top.

**Artist**: Dipanjan Pal  
**Twitter**: [@dipanjan_photos](https://twitter.com/dipanjan_photos)  
**Edition Size**: 36  
**License**:  The holder of this NFT is free to use the same for any non-commercial use with appropriate credits, including but not limited to virtual galleries, private or public exhibition, and social media. All copyrights for the original artwork are reserved by the artist.
